name: 1 Button Snake
description:
This quick knock-off Snake game was made in 12 hours for the #1ButtonJam, where you submit a game that only needs one button to play. Feeling like I really enjoy these tiny game jams! Essentially made classic Snake but without being confined to a grid, and also with no direction controls of your own.

Features
  • Snake but harder
    No direction controls. To move where you want, try to get the timing of the pointer arrow correct.
    180 degree movement, no grids.
  • Snake but easier
    Snake doesn't move on its own - take your time.
    The walls can't kill you - only your own tail can.
    More food - no need to hunt down one piece of food, multiple spawn exponentially.
  • Easy
    A slight challenge at best - this game was meant to be a quick win, not a rage-inducer.
Credits

This game was thrown together by Asith (@AsithDevs on Twitter). Stick around for more random stuff. I have no idea what I could make next!
